website_summaries.verdict: A multipurpose scent diffuser that makes it easy to improve the aroma in the car or around the office or house.
pros: Simple operation with clear, durable controls for different mist modes
Can be used on a continuous or intermittent basis
Comes with color-changing LED lights for mood lighting in the vehicle
cons: Changing angles while in motion (driving down or uphill, tight curves) can trigger auto shutoff

customer_reviews.title: Will break and you will be ignored.
customer_reviews.text: Worked only a few months, attempted to contact the manufacturer/seller and was ignored. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: okay so yes, this takes up a cup holder, but seriously it diffuses PERFECT! i love the settings of 30 sec mist, or continuous mist. It looks up to my USB port in my Van, and it actually fills my van up with the scent of the oil pretty quick. I had the other diffuser that hooked up to your lighter port but it bugged out in a matter of 2 days. I love that this doesn't have a filter stick to replace.
customer_reviews.author: -x4HauLau

customer_reviews.title: Great design for cars
customer_reviews.text: I am a heavy eo diffusing user and have 2 in my homes with numerous eo bottles in rotations. I figured i would want to relax right after leaving the office and getting into my car so i decided to get this one. It is a great buy! There is a lor of thoughts put inti the design of the buttons and the power in plug. It fits well in my cup holder (a bit smaller but sturdy enough to stand). The lights are nice and thw mist power is just right for a small space like inside of a car. Would recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: So I read all the great reviews and decided to purchase this diffuser, to use in my car. I am big on aromatherapy and was hoping to diffuse my oils during my long commutes. I loved the size of the diffuser and the fact that it could fit in my cup holder, unfortunately it turned out to be a huge disappointment, I cannot smell the oils when the diffuser is running. The light is the only thing that lets you know it is on since you can’t smell it unless you are holding it in front of your nose, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in my office since purchasing it, never filled over the max line, have cleaned it regularly and after about a month it has stopped working! It will turn on for less then 2 minutes and then shut off. Update: I have contacted support@innogear.net and they are sending a replacement. All they required was what was going on with it and a picture with the logo. They were pretty quick on their response time, now I’m just waiting on the replacement. I hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: So glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to be able to experience my YLEO while driving. I have only had it and used it one day, but it worked great. If that should change, I'll let you know. I read the reviews on all the portable diffusers and felt this was the one to go with and I am so glad I did! I love the lights. The only downside, is that for me, I want the scent hitting me in the face. LOL but I still smell it and have found my car holds the scent once turned off. I can get back in my car and tell it had been running.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Mc

customer_reviews.title: This is horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible!!!! Doesn't work except for about the first 10 days. LOVED it when it worked. Can't find a way to return or contact seller. SAVE YOUR MONEY,
customer_reviews.author: C. Glew

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Update review: They’ve reached out to me and offered to send another unit for free. This time it is working! I’m happy to receive a great service from them! Satisfied costumer! Old review: I was so excited to use this. But the machine is not working. The light is on but you don’t see or feel the steam coming put from the mouth. I added some more essential oil maybe it just needed more. Can’t smell anything. I just let it in while I was driving for 1 hour. The water was bubling very weak. The same water level I put in is the smae water after I finished driving. I must have received a defect.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare of a product
customer_reviews.text: If you get anything on the exterior of this product it melts the plastic and they almost started a fire. This is by no means a product ( I purchased two) that should be in a vehicle. Imagine the nightmare if it gets spilled in your vehicle and melts the plastic on your console. Imagine the nightmare when it spills near your computer at work much less your home.
customer_reviews.author: Maci Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not looking to be set on fire, thanks.
customer_reviews.text: This created a huge amount of condensation all over the side of the product, the inside of my cup holder, and it sparked after the third use. This is cheap garbage. Update: I was contacted by the company to be sent a refund 2 years after I bought this. They never refunded my money. I stand by my one-star review.
customer_reviews.author: TraceyG

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 weeks, then stopped! Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this diffuser for my new 2020 C 300. It worked great for 2 weeks, which I rarely drive nowadays and now it just stopped working. I made sure it was plugged into a sufficient USB with correct voltage, didn't fill it past the max line and still doesn't work. Would give it 5 stars if it worked properly, but since it doesn't I would not recommend and give it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: seoulfull

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: company refunded me...
customer_reviews.text: The company contacted me for a full refund. Great customer service! (Old review) For some reason, mine keeps shutting off. It is plugged in fully because once I hit the "power on" button, it comes right back on. Weird and kind of annoying. Otherwise, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe B

customer_reviews.title: Weak mist and shutting down
customer_reviews.text: Review edited: I have raised my concern to the vendor and I am very satisfied with their customer service. They resolved my issue right away. --------- I have been using this diffuser in the car for about 2 weeks but the mist is not as strong as what I have seen in the videos and most of the time no mist at all. Its shutting down on its own. I have followed the instructions but stull the same. I bought this because of the good reviews but its not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a diffuser for my car! Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when this arrived in the mail on time(Prime shipping). Packaging was as if I bought it right off of the shelf. I unwrapped it, plugged it into my car charger, added water from a water bottle, added my essential oil(3 drops) and pressed the power button. Works like a charm. I'm always in the car with kids and driving to work. Can't wait to use it on a daily basis. Yes, I loose a cup holder but I am just fine with that. Scent was good. Not sure how much it's going to move around while driving but we will see.
customer_reviews.author: schooper

customer_reviews.title: Mold trap
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the design and functionality, however after 3 uses, it became moldy somewhere inside of it which then went into my car. Unfortnately, I couldn't get to where the mold was to be able to clean it 😔. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This product is absolutely horrible. I opened it up turns it on it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely horrible. I opened it up turns it on it works for about 5 minutes went to go turn it back on for the next car ride and it will not turn on at all. So I got about 5 minutes of usage for $15 and now I'm on a 18 hour car ride with my kids and I do not have a diffuser in the car to calm them down. Absolutely horrible product I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: tammyosiecki

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working/ received replacement
customer_reviews.text: After researching and reading reviews, I decided to buy this portable diffuser. It's super cute convenient and worked for a few days then just stopped working- very disappointed especially since I thought I bought an item that was revered as a good product. UPDATE*** I was contacted by the seller and they immediately sent a replacement for my defective diffuser. My replacement thus far seems to be working well. As a matter of fact, my coworkers (including manager) have stated they'd like to purchase one. To the sellers--Thank you very much for your prompt response and replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysMyGirls

customer_reviews.title: Great for driving!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of my favorite things I’ve ever bought on Amazon! Not only does it give off a great smell but it is so easy to use and for the price that it’s at it is an absolutely amazing product which should be essential in every car! It gives off such a great smell and makes your driving experience so much better with not only the colors but the mess going in your face with the smell and it just makes everything better when you get into your car! Thank you so much for the product and I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eli Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this, but am extremely disapointed that it only seems to work about 5% of the time. At first I didn't think it worked at all, and then after several tries (pushing the two buttons in different combinations, and holding down for long periods of time) it finally went on. However, it does not stay on and sometimes it's only on for about 10 seconds. Most of the time I just give up after 6-7 tries with the button. I saw that several other people have had the same problem, and I would definitely not recommend this to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Dawn Willan

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of mist
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer to not have to give up a cup holder to this, but I will bc I like it so much. It gives off a steady stream of cool mist. It carries a lot of scent and does exactly what I was hoping for- gets rid of the funky smell in my car! I leave it plugged in all the time and sometimes forget that I have to turn it back on when I get back in the car. I’ve tried the diffuser pads that go in the vent, that get plugged into the charger, etc. This one is the best by far!
customer_reviews.author: paxawTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Then...NOTHING. No mist.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item. It worked great in my car for five days. Then it stopped working. The light comes on, but no mist comes out of it. I was so disappointed. It worked great initially, but very short lived success with this item. Too bad. It made my car smell great! They sent me a second one to try but it is exactly the same thing, and I’m feeling it up correctly. I don’t know why it doesn’t work in my car but I’ve tried two of them and they just don’t dispense the steam after a few days. I keep them filled properly.
customer_reviews.author: CS in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser with Perfectly as per Advertised. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The product working as per advertised. Perfectly fit into any cup holder in car. It working perfectly with quality of mist produced; a fine dry mist without any droplet nearby. The sound produced completely negligible; very quietly operated only sometime the minor splash sound produced. Totally very pleasant. The auto-stop function working great. No need to worry if the water running low, the diffuser will stop automatically. Besides, any sudden movement also will stop the diffuser automatically. The duration with max level liquid as indicated can reach to 3 hours. User friendly machine and easy to top-up liquid. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shukry

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a trucker, so this I use this over the road all the time. Seeing as the scent is entirely based off of your to add and mix oils for diffusing, don't get mad at the diffuser for your failures of making nice scents. This will diffuse without any issues, just read and follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: BaronVonBolt

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my car because I was going on a 2 week road trip from coast to coast and it was a godsend. Traveled with two humans, a dog, and a cat and the car always smelled nice and clean. Great to put in some scents to help stay awake during long rides. Now I use it all the time on the sporadic setting for everyday driving and it's the perfect scent level without being overwhelming. Fills my RAV4 perfectly. Even used in the tent (again one dog and one cat is not the perfect smell recipe) with a portable battery and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I like this diffuser for the car and to take into hotel rooms. It’s only issue is that it’s very finicky about how much water, you cannot fill it past the line even a tiny bit or it makes splashing sounds. It’s small but strong enough to freshen hotel rooms and keep the car smelling good on road trips. I do which the top piece was attached somehow by a flap or something because I have dropped it in the car several times.
customer_reviews.author: Juja Z.

customer_reviews.title: Fan not working on the unit. So no mist :(
customer_reviews.text: We finally got a chance to use these today. My sister and i both bought one each. Hers seems to be ok with good flowing mist. Mine however did not produce any mist coming out although it is misty inside the cup. Finally i noticed that on mine the fan on the bottom does not turn on which explains the lack of mist blowing out. On the other unit she has, the fan turns on and produces powerful mist. Edit: The company did reach out and refund me for the non-functioning unit so I am bumping up the review from 1* to 4* since I am no longer out any money for the non-functioning unit.
customer_reviews.author: Phasers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** Since I wrote my original review the company reached out to me asking to replace my original diffuser with one that had a bigger water reservoir (70mil) since that was what I was unhappy about. Of course I said sure and they had it to me within two days and I absolutely love it! Great company and even better customer service!! Works better then my last one that plugged into my adapter, but the water reservoir is so small I’m constantly having to refill. For the price I hoped for something more.
customer_reviews.author: Ce Ce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little diffuser for your car!
customer_reviews.text: I love InnoGear's little car diffuser. It is a seriously amazing invention. I am embarrassed to say that I end up using this mini diffuser more often than my full-size diffuser at home. I get in the car, and it hangs out in the cup-holder and so it is right there. It may be small, but it packs a powerful punch. I have never had mine spill while in the cup-holder. I hope InnoGear comes out with a larger one the size of coffee travel mug. I end up draining this wee diffuser within a few days. That said, this really is a great no frills portable diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: awesome car diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Its so cute and compact, and works fantastically. I've tried many diffusers and this one is by far my favorite. I'm always skeptical with diffusers working correctly so I posted a video of it working.. only reason I bought it was because of the raving reviews and so glad I gave it a chance! Makes my car smell great and don't have to have it on for more than a few minutes for the nice essence smell to last all day! Im a petsitter who transports pups of all sizes so it is so great to have something to clean the air and not have my car smell like dog lol! A must have and highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Keliann Oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Would be again.
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my car and take it in my office! I have a long drive to work and love that I can diffuse on the road. Holds small amount of water have to refill often. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Mengel

customer_reviews.title: Turns off if water level slants
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a road trip but ended up using it very little. Every time I went up or down a hill, it would turn off. Seems it only works when you are driving on a straight road. On hills or curves, the water level slants and makes the diffuser turn off. On plus side, it sits really good in my cup holder. I was really disappointed in this. NOTE: The company handled this very well and sent me a free home diffuser...which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Update: Things came out perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I first received a broken diffuser and was disappointed. But InnoGear really came through for me and helped me. Upon requesting an exchange, an employee from InnoGear emailed me directly and helped me make sure that the exchange process went smoothly. I received my new diffuser about 2 weeks ago and everything has been great. The diffuser is the perfect size for my car and office. I'm really pleased with the professionalism that Sunny had with me and making sure that I was a satisfied customer. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: sgarcia30

customer_reviews.title: Best way to freshen up your car!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this easily fits into my cup holder! I never knew how badly I needed this in my life. I just bought a new car and it had this new car scent that I just personally am not a fan of. Car fresheners just weren’t doing it for me so I decided to invest in this and I am so glad I did. I love how you have the option to turn on the lights and it changes colors while filling your car with such pleasant aromas! I get compliments of how amazing my car smells every day! This is a must have in my opinion, 10/10 would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamilette Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! So many car diffusers extend directly from a cigarette lighter outlet. That won’t work with the way our car is set up. This one plugs in with a USB chord and happily sits in the cup holder. The mist is impressive for such a small diffuser! We have 5 diffusers, now, and I’d say this is comes in at #3. And that’s saying something because the two I’d rank above it are both full scale, full room diffusers. I love that it uses a USB chord, because that makes it more versatile. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: embe_3

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: To start off, i love this thing. It lasts about 5 hours when i use it, (I fill it a little above the max line, OOPS!), but the little guy pushes out so much that it quickly fills the area! It's really nice to use though, and it is small (About the width of a normal coffee mug). The 30 second cycle is really good if you don't want TOO much to push out all at once, and the LEDs on the device are nice actually and not too bright. Haven't tried it at night however, but I'm sure it isnt too bad
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M

customer_reviews.title: I had it overfilled.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE! I had it overfilled. The water level has to be SPOT ON. Do not overfill even a CM past the line. I'm surprised by the good reviews. Just got it and tried to use it today for the first time. I plugged it in my car and cannot smell anything. I've had it plugged in at my desk ALL day!! Still not smell and the water level has not moved AT ALL. The container gets very warm with the lights on so I stopped using the light. I'm going to be boxing it up and sending this back tomorrow. Disappointing and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little diffuser! It produces a great scent and the LED light gives off a pleasant glow at night. I had a problem with the first one that I bought, and I just want to say how wonderful this company is. They promptly replied to my email and arranged for a replacement, since my original unit was still under warranty. My new diffuser is working great, and I think that a company that stands by its product should be recognized. In this day and age, that means something!
customer_reviews.author: LH momto4

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: *** Update*** the seller contacted me to see if they could help troubleshoot the problem. Nothing worked so they sent me a replacement and it is working great! Great customer service!! It was great while it lasted, but it stopped working today for no apparent reason. Was working great and then just stopped. Tried a different power cord, not that. Pretty bummed the return window is only a month. I've had mine for about 7 weeks. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Mist Could Be Stronger
customer_reviews.text: I can't use my large-size diffuser in the house too often since I have a cat, but I bought this car diffuser for when I'm traveling to and from places. Overall, it's a nice fit - doesn't disrupt the cleanliness of my car. The only thing is that I have my cup holders in the console of my car and the mist just doesn't seem strong enough to reach me. Instead, it kind of floats backwards into the backseat. I do like that it'll help the car smell nice over a period of time, but it would be nicer if the mist was actually stronger.
customer_reviews.author: O truant Muse

customer_reviews.title: Nonsense
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a couple of years ago and it lasted me until this year. I bought a new one, which burned up the motor the 1st time I plugged it in. I exchanged it and now this one, which I've used prob 3 times, will not turn on anymore. I don't know if they changed manufacturers or not, but this is ridiculous. Got a refund quickly, so I'm updating from a 1 star to 3 for no-hassle customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Travel friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a blessing this beauty is!! My puppy is anxious in vehicles and we took a 14hr road trip, calming oil helps her soo much. This was awesome to have to use for her + keep the truck smelling nice and fresh!!! Now my boyfriend wants one for his truck just because lol! It’s also nice bc while we’re gone, we didn’t bring our normal diffuser but you can plug this in to anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I've decided I'm not as in love with having a car diffuser as I thought I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've decided I'm not as in love with having a car diffuser as I thought I would be. It's a great idea, but the logistics of carrying oils around (don't want to leave them in a hot car), remembering to fill and start the diffuser BEFORE driving, remembering to stop it, if the trip is short, so you don't come back to an over scented car, etc. etc. Right now I have it in a bathroom and I LOVE it there! Perfect for a small room like that or and office space. Bottom line, it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: chromacosmic

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 in a year that simply stopped working. When I notified Innogear about the 2nd one they immediately took steps to replace it free of charge. That's great customer service. I like the size for my desk. I sell eo's and I recommend Innogear to everyone as a more affordable option.
customer_reviews.author: dakota1gal

customer_reviews.title: Stops working every 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product...when it works. I’ve had it for a few months now and the first month it worked great and now going on the following 2, it stops all the time. If this product would work it would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! It doesn't stay on. I turn it on and seconds later i look to see its off. Did this over and overtime! It only uses the smallest amount of water too so that's super annoying!
customer_reviews.author: JulieinTx

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: While it's on, my car smells great! My daughter likes mine so much that I ordered one for her car too. The scented oils I bought to use with this: Just for Her Gift Set of 6 Premium Fragrance Oils - Guava Colada Type, Twilight Woods Type, Bali Mango Type, Passion Fruit & Guava, Juniper Breeze Type, Love Spell by Barnhouse Blue are great! My daughter wanted those too! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Iree

customer_reviews.title: SMALL and POWERFUL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I wanted another diffuser for our new RV. I also wanted with that powered by USB. This does the tricked. Love the size and fits in holder in RV or will sit on counter. The switches are on top which is very important if you use it n vehicle holder. Just received and have not given it months of use so if I find that any of the five Star items do not continue, I will surely revisit.
customer_reviews.author: shopinful

customer_reviews.title: It only it stayed on
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. My friend sells doTERRA and has their brand in her car and I had to have one. Found this on Amazon. Worked great for the first 5 to 6 months then occasionally when you would turn it on and the power button would light up for 15 seconds or so then shut off. You could keep playing with it and after a few tries it would start working correctly. Now it may come on for 10 seconds if at all. I really like the design and it would have been perfect but now its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: you wont regreat buying this you may buy more thats how great this is!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical of this product but it really does work. my whole family loves essential oils better than perfumes. what better way to have fresh smells I my car we loved the product so much my husband asked me to get one for hhis truck and everyone he works with in the army asks him where he bought it and what's it called. the most is just right nothing gets wet fits in cupholders and great light changing solid or motion no leaks my the way
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I'd been looking for, works like a charm. My job entails my driving long distances and I wanted something that would last longer than 30 minutes and do as good a job as the diffusers I use at home. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: Second Chance and Loving It
customer_reviews.text: It only worked for 2 months and broke. InnoGear reaches out to me to replace it. They explained in depth on how to properly use it and maintenance. I love it! It works well. It gives off a great smell in my car. The changing colors of light is cool. Thanks InnoGear for giving me a second chance to enjoy your product.
customer_reviews.author: E Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for cup holder.
customer_reviews.text: Auto shut off, starts diffusing immediately great product. Wish it had an option to choose your colors instead of having to wait for the color you want and then pressing the led button gain to lock it at that color. That’s a huge lain if you like blue, takes about two minutes to get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Work! Cheap!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. Total defective. You have to hold the power button just for it to start diffusing. On top of that, the max line that they swear wont work if you pour over it rubs of with nothing but a drop of oil so good luck remembering how much is too much. I was really looking forward to having a diffuser for my car. I can't say yoh get what you pay for, because i bought another brand for my home that was the same price more or less and it's amazing! Buy & Weep... Returned.
customer_reviews.author: M.Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Bringing Balance to my morning drive
customer_reviews.text: Got this cause my wife and I were getting more into essential oils, So I figured with my long to work why not diffuse some oils in my car to bring some balance to my drive. I love the colors and the amount of fragrance the difuser puts out. It's very easy to use, one button on and off...and one button to change the color of the light. Very happy with the purchase perfect for my doterra oils.
customer_reviews.author: importceo

customer_reviews.title: Pump was not strong enough to diffuse.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for my parents since they are both retired and travel a lot. They kept saying it didn’t work but I thought maybe they didn’t know how to use it. When I finally got around to trying out, the pump was not strong enough to push out mist. It is at the water line and I see it working just not enough to diffuse.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purely based on previous ratings and reviews. I was a bit apprehensive to buy it because it was lower priced than all the other diffusers that were available. After more than a couple months I am beyond happy to report that this product has worked wonders for me. I have had absolutely no problems with this whatsoever. I read the small instruction guide and followed it to a T which resulted in a wonderful experience. I love this diffuser so much I went ahead and bought this company's portable car diffuser as well. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a cheaper product that delivers amazing quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: inky123

customer_reviews.title: awesome...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it came within 48 hours....had to buy an adapter ...but I love love love it... so much I bought one for my BFF in Texas...hers came immediately too... we are both nurses and to have our essential oil infusing after a long 12 hour shift in the trenches...it truly is calming.... thank you It totally rocks !
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kiernan

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing,there are people who think I don’t know that they smoke in my car of course I know— looking for a good smell good product and I found it.This works great — controls are on top of the unit for easy access-the usb plug-in is in the right spot again easy access the top lefts off again easy access,I love it already—And I got it on Sunday 5 stars for delivery and the Innogear itself,love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brentley T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Updated. New one still alive. Already dead.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I couldn’t figure out how to contact the company but they contacted me after my review and replaced the unit. So far so good with the new one so good on them. I updated this to 4 stars, not 5 for the hassles. They did ask me to update my review which is fair. This product was SUPER COOL when i got it. Now it's SUPER DEAD and there's no contact info for the seller. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: DDT

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 1 use. The water detector isn’t working. I’ve put less water, more water...the only way it works is if it’s being held at a tilt which will not work in a car and not convenient to sit around and hold like that
customer_reviews.author: cpay23

customer_reviews.title: I really like this diffuser and being able to enjoy my E
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diffuser and being able to enjoy my E.O.'s in the car. It fits in to a cup holder, the power button is on top (I've read it's not in others), easy to add more water and provides a good mist. This is my third InnoGear diffuser (2 in the house), I have had no issues with any of them. I am very happy with all of my purchases!
customer_reviews.author: JenMcL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!  That is a MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my drive from the west coast to the east coast. I have my two cats and five gliders along for the ride so I needed something to help keep the air fresh and not smelling too bad. This was perfect. Granted it is rather small. It fits inside a cup holder if that tells you much. Yes I did have to fill it more often but I didn't mind. When I stopped I would just top it off and keep on going. Now that I have moved I use it at my desk and its nice to throw a nice smell up and around me.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Browning

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ This for anyone who loves their car to smell good & is into essential oils!
customer_reviews.text: Love this new gadget for the car! It makes it so pleasant to drive! This would be a perfect gift for a new mom, any mom driving kids all over getting stressed! In winter I'll have to bring it in cuz living in the north the water will freeze! But it'll be so worth it! I might try adding alcohol to it so it doesn't freeze but I have such a sensitive nose I'd probably smell that! We shall see! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Good Misting, Good Run-Time, OK Cleaning (need smaller hands)
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly enjoyed this Product, I actually stopped using it in my car and just keep it at my office desk... it does occasionally (once per use or so) shut down for no reason, with half the water still in it. I don't know if it is due to the system heating or falsely detecting low water... but it runs for about two hours before it usually happens and I just turn it back on and keep working. If you keep it in your car, PUT IT IN YOUR ARM REST!!! it will overheat and die out even in moderate (75-80 deg) weather if it gets direct sunlight throughout a work-day. Good amount of mist, fairly easy cleaning, good run-time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Use for smaller cars
customer_reviews.text: So I liked the idea of having a scent defuser in the car instead of having to always buy those trees to hang on mirror. HOWEVER THE SCENT DOESNT GO THROUGHOUT THE CAR. I am the only one who smells it. Looks like I’ll be buying those little trees after all **update** The company is kind enough to offer a refund or a upgrade. I took the refund because I had already settled on a different air refresher
customer_reviews.author: alexandra motz

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product... but after a few uses it just doesn’t work anymore. I can hear the motor running, but nothing is coming out. Really disappointed, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Webb

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing packs a punch and lasts for a good while if your commute is not too long. I’d say it lasts for at least 2hrs if running the whole time. The scent is pretty strong as well. I use about 5 drops of essential oil each time I fill it. One tip is DO NOT overfill!
customer_reviews.author: Alli A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. The only issue I had was remembering to top of the water. I ended up plugging it into the bathroom (just used a usb wall charger, which was really nice) and using it in there since it is a really small bathroom. It is also where we keep the cat litter and I wanted something to help with the smell that wasn't a toxic air freshener. I love the diffuser!
customer_reviews.author: staggsjd

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a few days, but so far it's been great. I bought this for my office after buying a cute little decorative one that did not work. This thing is a workhorse -- the steam pours out of it,the scent is strong (so much so I have to turn it off for a few), and the changing colors are fun. Also have one for my car, but I have not opened that one yet. Fingers crossed it continues to be so fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: L♡VE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my car!!! Highly recommend using this scent with this product while driving, it will put you in a better mood instantly ... Nature's Truth Essential Oil, Happiness, 0.51 Fluid Ounce
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great portable diffuser & helpful customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love this little diffuser. It's perfect for my car. It would also be great for a small office. The customer service was also responsive when the light stopped working about a week after purchasing. They sent me a new one and its been working well! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one use
customer_reviews.text: Good for the five minutes it lasted for. Stopped working after using once. Was expecting more considering the good reviews. Big FAIL. Luckily I was refunded with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissi W

customer_reviews.title: Good Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love essential oils and wish I could live with a diffuser mask connected to my face. But reality forbidding this type of activity this diffuser is great. I have it four stars because it can be somewhat temperamental. Sometimes it will turn on immediately, sometimes I have to keep hitting the button or play with the cable and pray over it. I've only had it a couple weeks, hope it lasts a while. Love the light.
customer_reviews.author: Mcbre

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the car! I thought you could charge it so that you didn’t always have to have it plugged in but you can’t. That’s okay because I can plug it into the console. I will use Velcro to put it on a side so I don’t have to use up a cup holder, but the product is great! I fill it to the max line use one drop of oil and it fills my car with the smell. It lasts longer than one day too so I can leave it and not have to bring it in and out every day. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Keira

customer_reviews.title: Good for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this diffuser for 3 months. So far it’s been versatile for traveling I use it in the car and in hotel rooms. The fill line marker rubbed off, so I had to etch it in with a knife - It doesn’t work well if over filled. The plastic tends to hold the scent of the last oil used even after cleaning and soaking with soap/alcohol/vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: No need for car fresheners anymore
customer_reviews.text: I love having this in my car for a little extra moisture in the air and pleasant scent from essential oil. I think I have less road rage when I’m breathing in a relaxing scent haha and I no longer use car scent thingies on my car vents. Perfect size and I love the led lights.
customer_reviews.author: anjanique

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I have several diffusers around my home so, I was pleasantly surprised at how well this item worked when I initially turned it on. However, that was short lived. Around the 20-30 minute mark, it stopped emitting mist. The mist built up inside the diffuser but no longer came out of the hole in the top. I tried turning it off and back on, changing the water level, unplugging and replugging it back in, starting over, etc- nothing worked. I attempted these things multiple times and still the mist stays inside the diffuser and does not emit through the lid- sadly, I am returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tillery

customer_reviews.title: best one on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing it works wonderfully. I use tea tree oil in mine because I am in a car pool and tea tree kills all air born germs. When my sister seen my post on face book she had to have one also. I left a friend of mine use it and he and his wife love it.The really best thing about this is it has a usb connection so you can use it anywhere, in your car, house,motel or camper.
customer_reviews.author: lurganave

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER ONLY 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this product, I loved it! I was looking forward to using it on my future travel trips however, after only having this product for 3 months, it has failed me. It no longer works, it’s like it’s only meant to have a short lifetime. I’m upset because I take care of my items and clean them properly as suggested and this item still broke down on me.
customer_reviews.author: Aly626

customer_reviews.title: Best car product invented!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little diffuser. I use all brands of essential oils and they all work fine. It works like any other diffuser, totally what I expected. This is my second InnoGear product and I'm completely satisfied with it. So much better than any other type of "car freshener"! When you are in a car, you most likely have the heat or ac on, I really like that I can keep moisture in the air so my sinuses stay comfy. Color changing light was not important to me, but I find I really like it. Fits in cup holder just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna P

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised and the instructions are fairly clear. The only criticism is the reservoir. The entire reservoir depletes in a 30 minute drive. Constantly have to remind myself to refill prior to every trip.
customer_reviews.author: M4carbin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This tiny diffuser is amazing! So small yet a lot of vapor comes out of it. I bought it for my desk at work to subtly diffuse oils at my desk without making the whole office smell and it’s perfect. The vapor diffuses at a forward angle rather then straight up which is great. Plastic seems durable enough to travel with and the USB plug is great. Really good portable diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: This product is complicated to operate, doesn't fit well in cup holder and doesn't diffuse well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a trip and it worked perfectly! The kids loved that it changes light too. It is also perfect for small spaces like the car and the bathroom. I highly recommend it. The only bummer is that it doesn’t last the whole night, but since the kids didn’t noticed it, we were fine.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great for very small spaces, like cars.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two and neither disperse as much mist as the ones in the videos. I followed directions and added water to below fill line and left on continuous, minimal mist. However, the aroma in our cars is satisfactory. Therefore I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Family_Guy_77

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great then Died
customer_reviews.text: We loved this for a few trips. Since the pandemic hit, we haven't needed this diffuser. It's been sitting clean and dry in storage. We went for a long drive this weekend and wanted to enjoy some aromatherapy, but the diffuser no longer works. We are very dissapointed. It won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine G. Winters

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little diffuser with powerful mist!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little diffuser. It is perfect for my desk at work. Calming mist and color change offers a little peace during the day. Don’t recommend for a Yukon cup holder because it gathered moisture around the cup holder area but for a desk it is fantastic!!!! Love it and the price point was good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Updated review!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just need a stronger oil or to add more, but it really hasn’t filled my Jeep Grand Cherokee with the scent. I have left it on continuous and I have to place it right under my nose to smell it. May just be user error though. I have only had it a couple days so am going to try a couple more things out then can update this. Update: Innogear saw my review and refunded my money. I am still using my car diffuser. It seems to work better in my husband’s truck with a smaller enclosed area, but still isn’t super strong even with adding more oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Murr

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for the car
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the car. It really works well. The only complaint I have that if you run it constantly while you are driving, you can only put enough water in it for a few hours, then you have to refill it, this is really a minor annoyance. Would definitely buy this again.. In fact I think it will be the perfect Christmas gift this year!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. LadyA

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended but it doesn’t hold enough water and oil for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my car. It diffuses well and added scent to my car. Due to its size, it runs out of water quickly, too quickly for me. Although it did what it was intended to do, I would opt for something larger that would last longer rather than purchase another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Treva Millarr

customer_reviews.title: Okay - but probably returning
customer_reviews.text: As for the compact and easy to use design, it’s great. It doesn’t diffuse the oil well though. It puts out a good amount of humidity, but not so much the essential oil. Considering returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Riccione

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I love the subtle smell the oils leave in my car, way better than an air freshener. I would recommend running plain water through it maybe 1-2 times first before putting in the drops because it did smell kind of more like plastic the first 2 times around, than the oil I put in there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M. Torres-delgado

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice for what it is.I love how the colors fade from color to color. The only thing that would make it better would be if you can control the amount of mist it emits so it's not just a continuous stream nonstop. It's made for the car and works great, but the problem is you can only really put it in a cup holder, so the cord sometimes makes it hard to station in a good spot, which is why a battery-powered option would have been great. Or if you could charge it with the cord then place it wherever.
customer_reviews.author: GumboLagniappe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have changed my rating. This was my original review: I have only had this diffuser for a couple of months (almost three) and it stopped working. Very disappointed! I would not recommend buying this product. HOWEVER, the company contacted me and not only offered many different things to try and fix my diffuser, they sent me a new one. I just received the new one today and I am excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Hreat compact size
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact diffuser, it sits perfectly in my cup holder. Only thing I don't love is the small amount of water it holds AND due to a piece inside that sits high where the water is absorbed it means that much less water that can be used. This results in frequent need to add more water and EO.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but stop working in 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd once I purchased it works perfect . However after 2 months it stop working both times. The light come on the but the mist just stops. I would love to give it 10 stars sorry I can't.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina J.

customer_reviews.title: Good and small
customer_reviews.text: It is small and good for a truck. Blows strong and even though it only takes a small amount of water the water lasts for a long time. If you fill the water past the fill line it will not blow properly.
customer_reviews.author: A.Barree

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest thing to keep your car smelling fresh and clean with out any chemical air freshener. I usually put one to two drops and that is enough to keep the air smelling nice. Also, a nice stress reliever when your in traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: You will need to use the warranty, if you can figure out how to contact the company!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 5 months. Now when i hit the power button, it's green for a second, and then turns off. I have tried cleaning it, with no luck. This states it has an 18 month warranty. How do i go about contacting the company to get a new one? ***UPDATE 7/11/17*** After contacting the company, they verified my Amazon purchase, and sent me out new ones! We came to the conclusion that it might have been the type of oils that i was using that caused the initial issue. Since then, I have switched brands of oil, and have yet to have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: JCAndrews

customer_reviews.title: Develops a film and stops working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first week! Then it developed a thick oil film all over and stopped working...I turn it on and it diffuses for about 5-10 seconds then runs but doesn’t diffuse.
customer_reviews.author: tillie

product_meta.title: InnoGear Car Diffuser, USB Essential Oil Diffuser Ultrasonic Car Humidifier Aromatherapy Diffusers with Intermittent/Continuous Mist for Office Travel Home Vehicle (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

 InnoGear USB Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser

This InnoGear car diffuser is cool in more ways than one. In addition to its adorable design that fits right into any decor style, it serves as both an essential oil diffuser and a mini humidifier, adding healthy moisture and elegant aromatherapy into the atmosphere.

Easy Taking-off Cap
User-friendly lift-up cover, no bother to unscrew the cap with great force and avoid water spilling out.

Elegant Night Light
Unlike those diffusers with solid outer shell, this car diffuser with transparent outer shell will not block out the light, making it both a great night light and wonderful home decor.

Hassle-free Power Jack
Having the power jack designed at the back rather than at the bottom, making it convenient to use.

Lightweight & Compact
This diffuser adopts finest plastic for the lightest possible weight, 0.29 lb only. It is easily to be tucked into your bag or luggage, travel ready.

USB Interface Design
Standard 5V input, usb power supply for easy charging

Car Applicable
This car diffuser is a perfect fit to any vehicle cup holder, a great small device to perfume your way home or help to stay alert when with drops of your favorite blend in.

Package Contents
1 x Aroma Diffuser
1 x USB Cable (44 inches, 110cm)
1 x User Manual

Note
1. Package comes with a USB cable. If you are using the diffuser in the car, please use 5V 1A USB adapter. If you are using the diffuser with laptop, please use with USB 3.0 Port.
2. The diffuser will automatically shut off when water level is low (When making a sudden stop while driving, water may pour out and diffuser may auto shut off).
3. Do not add water more than 50ml MAX line.
feature_bullets: INGENIOUS & PRACTICAL: This aroma diffuser, with delicate appearance, is designed to be a perfect decorative piece that fits in with any decor. Comparing with other compact and portable designs, the cap of the diffuser is easy to take off, so you can unscrew the cap with ease.

LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT: This car diffuser, weights 0.29 lb and stands 4.92 inches in height, is small enough to carry on vacation or out of town business, portable for providing humidification and fragrance anywhere.
USB INTERFACE DESIGN: USB power supply for easy charging, connecting to lap top or desk top computer, or simple plug outlet. Please note no adapter is included in the package.

ADJUSTABLE MIST: Mist is controllable between continuous and intermittent.It serves as a diffuser, a vaporizer, a mini humidifier, and even a night lamp, perfect for living room, bedroom, conference room, baby room, spa romm, yoga, etc.

SAFE & EASY TO USE: With the buttons on the top, this car diffuser is handy to operate. It will power off automatically when water runs out, freeing you the concern of dry burning. Fantastic gift idea for your family, friends, and loves ones for holidays, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and any other occasions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,810 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
